text: Thomas Alan Bock (born April 11, 1945) is an American politician in the state of Vermont. He is a member of the Vermont House of Representatives, sitting as a Democrat from the Windsor-3-1 district, having been first elected in 2016.https://legislature.vermont.gov/people/single/2018.1/27182 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Vermont House of Representatives Category:Vermont Democrats
title: Thomas Bock (politician)
